info.title: Classroom API
info.description: API endpoints for managing classrooms, units, and announcements.

post.description: Creates a new student user profile with game profile information. Ensures the email is unique before registration.

message.example: This email is already registered! Please login or use a different email.

400.description: Bad request due to validation error or other issues

post.description: Registers a new admin account after verifying the registration code and ensuring email uniqueness. Optional school information can be provided.

schema.example: Invalid register code, please contact staff if you want to make an admin account!

message.example: This email is already registered! Please login or use a different email.

400.description: Bad request due to validation error or other issues

post.description: Registers a new teacher account, provided required fields (email, password, and name) are specified. Validates email uniqueness before registration.

400.description: Bad request due to missing required fields or validation error

schema.example: Email, password and name are required

message.example: This email is already registered! Please login or use a different email.

post.description: Authenticates a user by validating email and password, then returns a JWT token if successful.

400.description: Bad request due to missing email or password

401.description: Unauthorized due to invalid email or password

get.description: Fetches the profile information of the currently authenticated user based on the provided JWT token.

401.description: Unauthorized request due to invalid token or non-existent user

put.description: Allows an authenticated user to update their password by providing the current password and a new password.

401.description: Unauthorized request due to invalid token or incorrect old password

invalid_token.summary: Invalid token or missing user ID

post.description: Allows teachers to create a new classroom with a unique join code. Only users with the 'teacher' role are authorized to create classrooms.

name.description: The name of the classroom to be created.

400.description: Invalid request due to missing or incorrect fields, or unauthorized user

403.description: Forbidden - only teachers are authorized to create classrooms

post.description: Allows a user to join a classroom using a unique join code. The user must be authenticated via JWT.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: The unique join code for the classroom

400.description: Invalid request due to invalid classroom code or user

examples.already_enrolled: You are already enrolled in this classroom

get.description: Fetches a classroom's details using its unique ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the classroom to retrieve.

post.description: Fetches multiple classrooms based on an array of unique classroom IDs.

put.summary: Set Today's Unit for a Classroom
put.description: Updates the 'today_unit' field for a specified classroom by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the classroom to update.

unit.description: A string representing the unit ID (must be a valid MongoDB ObjectId format).

400.description: Invalid ID or unit ID format.

put.description: Updates the announcement for a specified classroom by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the classroom to update.

put.summary: Set Game Block Status for a Classroom
put.description: Updates the game block status for a specified classroom by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the classroom to update.

200.description: Successfully updated the game block status.

put.summary: Set Game Restriction Period for a Classroom
put.description: Updates the game restriction period for a specified classroom by ID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the classroom to update.

200.description: Successfully updated the game restriction period.

get.summary: Get a Single Non-Premium Unit by ID
get.description: Retrieves a unit by its ID, only if it is not premium.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the unit to retrieve.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all units in the system. Requires JWT authentication.
Retrieves a single unit by its ID. Requires JWT authentication.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the unit to retrieve.

get.description: Retrieves all units that are not premium.

post.description: Allows an admin user to create a new unit.
Allows an admin user to create a new lesson associated with a specific unit.

201.description: Lesson successfully created and added to the unit.

400.description: Invalid unit ID or user input.

post.description: Allows an admin user to create a new exercise associated with a specific unit.

201.description: Exercise successfully created and added to the unit.

400.description: Invalid unit ID or user input.

get.description: Fetches the user details by their ID. Password is excluded from the response.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to retrieve.

post.description: Fetches multiple user details based on the provided IDs. Passwords are excluded from the response.

ids.description: Array of user IDs to retrieve.

put.description: Allows users to set or update their profile picture URL.

profile_picture.description: The URL of the profile picture.

put.description: Allows users to set or update their school name.

Allows users to update their information including name, email, profile picture, school, game profile, feedback availability, and learning preferences. Also updates the user's information stored in other collections.

profile_picture.description: URL of the user's profile picture.

post.description: Allows adding points to a user's game profile and logging the transaction.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to whom points will be added.

classroom.description: ID of the classroom associated with the points.

giver.description: ID of the user giving the points (optional).

details.description: Additional details about the points transaction (optional).

400.description: Invalid ID or error in processing the request.

post.description: Allows subtracting points from a user's game profile and logging the transaction.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user from whom points will be subtracted.

classroom.description: ID of the classroom associated with the points.

details.description: Additional details about the points transaction (optional).

400.description: Invalid ID or error in processing the request.

put.description: Updates the learning preferences for a user.

learning_preferences.description: List of learning preferences for the user.

400.description: Invalid ID or error in processing the request.

put.description: Marks a lesson as completed for a user in a specific class and unit.

lessonId.description: The ID of the lesson to be completed.

classId.description: The ID of the class the user is enrolled in.

unitId.description: The ID of the unit that contains the lesson.

400.description: Invalid ID or error in processing the request.

post.description: Allows a user to submit an attempt for an exercise, including their answers and score.

exerciseId.description: The ID of the exercise being submitted.

score.description: The score obtained for the attempt.

answers.description: The user's answers for the exercise.

unitId.description: The ID of the unit to which the exercise belongs.

classId.description: The ID of the class in which the exercise is submitted.

put.description: Allows a user to set feedback on a specific exercise submission.

exercise_submission_id.description: The ID of the exercise submission.

class_progress_info_id.description: The ID of the class progress info.

feedback.description: The feedback for the exercise submission.
feedback.example: Well done! Try this exercise again, if you do better, I will give you extra points !!!
Well done! Try this exercise again, if you do better, I will give you extra points !!!

put.description: Allows a user to score a specific exercise submission.

exercise_submission_id.description: The ID of the exercise submission.

class_progress_info_id.description: The ID of the class progress info.

score.description: The score to assign to the exercise submission.

feedback.example: Well done! Try this exercise again, if you do better, I will give you extra points !!!

put.description: Resets the new exercise submissions for a user.
